prompt: Relocate the brand text and subtitle: move 'Arowwwai' to the top-center of the page, place the circular eagle logo directly below it, and move 'Logistic' to be centered under the logo. Keep original font, weight, color, and spacing relationships.
knowledge_prompt: This task requires consistent hierarchical alignment across multiple typographic elements. The model must reflow the layout so the main wordmark 'Arowwwai' becomes the top-centered anchor, the logo sits beneath it, and the descriptor 'Logistic' is centered under the logo. Typography and colors remain unchanged; only positions and spacing are adjusted to preserve visual balance.
